title: How to burn a movie into a DVD - Quora

response.answer_text: All you need to make sure is that your computer is equipped with a DVD drive, a piece of DVD burning software that can write video files to DVD discs and a DVD disc recordable. With these 3 things, you can burn videos onto DVD with ease. Take Leawo DVD Creator as an example to show how to burn a movie onto DVD. Step 1: Load movie files You can add the output files by clicking Add Video or directly dragging the movie files to the marked area.  Step 2: Burning settings Click the green Burn in the top right side of the interface, then a box will drop down. Here, you can choose the blank DVD disc as the target to burn those files under the “Burn to” box. If you would like to burn those files on computer, you can select folder or ISO file. Also, give output file a Disc Label and set the “Save to” directory.  Step 3: Start the burning After you confirm the burning settings, click grey Burn in the bottom to burn movie files to DVD. Then the process of burning will be going on.
